document_data.name: Arntethyl
document_data.mainbody: '''Arntethyl''' was a high mountain valley where the [[River Tesh]] was born and cascaded to the east, across the [[Dalelands]] and into the [[Moonsea]].
document_data.Description:
River Tesh moved across downslope across many gorges of the [[Desertsmouth Mountains]] and formed the river's [[Tesh Valley]].

Arntethyl held a supply encampment of the [[Zhentarim]] that supported the Black Network's activities in the great dessert of [[Anauroch]].
document_data.History: The encampment also held Zhentish troops that could be used as reinforcements across the region. The valley held at least a thousand Zhentish [[warrior]]s and twenty [[wizard]]s ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1360}}. During that time, the troops were led by the mage named [[Ruatheene]], a [[Manshoon]]'s favored, and her massive and powerful [[beholder]] [[Araunglauth]]. The beholder called the valley of Arntethyl its home for seventy years prior.
